structure.unit: LEVY AND ASSESSMENT OF PROPERTY TAXES

law.history: Repealed 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 168, sec. 158, effective January 1, 2006. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 206, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 327, sec. 7, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 152, sec. 105. -- Amended 1949 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 12. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 7. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4019a-11.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Mortgage assignments to be reported by banks and other companies.
